DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study design compare regenerative outcome use separately two different Xenografts sinus floor augmentation . Aim prospective randomized-controlled clinical trial compare regenerative result Alpha-Bio 's GRAFT Natural Bovine Bone versus commercially available bone graft two-step sinus floor elevation clinical histological analysis . Clinical Parameters wound heal parameter , radiological volume stability implant survival rate . Histological parameter base histomorphometrical analysis trephine core harvest progress implant bed preparation .
DOC.brief_title: Sinus Floor Elevation Using Alpha-Bio 's GRAFT Natural Bovine Bone v . Commercially Available Bone Graft
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients present moderately severely atrophic posterior maxilla 16 mm residual alveolar bone select study . 2 . Men woman age 18 year . 3 . Patient sign Informed Consent . 1 . Chronic steroid therapy , 2 . Uncontrolled diabetes , 3 . Cardiovascular disease , 4 . Past irradiation head neck 5 . Maxillary sinus cyst , 6 . Active chronic sinusitis , 7 . Smoking ten cigarette per day 3 month precede study . 8 . Malignant disease 5 year precede study 9 . Uncontrolled bleed disorder : hemophilia , thrombocytopenia , granulocytopenia 10 . Disease compromise immune system 11 . Psychiatric disorder 12 . Hypersensitivity titanium , collagen bovine bone . 13 . Women pregnant nursing . 14 . Patients nontreated periodontal disease . 15 . Medical and/or general contraindication intraoral surgical procedure
